lead_paragraph: Meal kit delivery is growing. Many chefs and cookbook authors who have tried it are pleasantly surprised.

headline.print_headline: It’s Dinner. But Is It Cooking?
headline.main: It’s Dinner in a Box. But Are Meal Delivery Kits Cooking?

snippet: Meal kit delivery is growing. Many chefs and cookbook authors who have tried it are pleasantly surprised.
abstract: Food experts debate on whether meal kits, boxes shipped to subscribers containing all ingredients and instructions needed to create home-cooked meal, are destined to become another fad or permanent part of America’s cooking culture.
